restaurants.title: We delight all palates with gourmet dining options | Grand Residences Riviera Cancun
restaurants.metadescription: Open your senses with the variety of gourmet dishes at Grand Residences Riviera Cancun. Enjoy delicious food and unlimited drinks at all of our restaurants!
restaurants.h1b: A gourmet experience in food, drinks and service
restaurants.menu: Magical dining moments are a big part of your luxury vacation experience at Grand Residences Riviera Cancun. Savor gourmet cuisine at three different restaurants and from 24-hour Room Service, enjoy theme nights during the week and order wines from an award-winning wine list for the perfect pairing. Sublime flavors and dishes that are a work of art. Experience culinary excellence in Puerto Morelos: sublime flavors, artful dishes, and romantic settings await. Our menus have something for everyone, including delicious vegetarian and vegan dishes. If you have special dietary needs, ask for options upon arrival.

El Faro Grill offers an international menu the best option for dining

24-hour room service in our beachfront resort

conceptos.descripcion: Live a totally Mexican gourmet experience in the Riviera Maya. Featuring dishes from all over the country, the menu is a celebration of Mexico’s World Heritage cuisine. Enjoy an exquisite blend of traditional recipes and chef’s creations, contemporary Mexican art and breathtaking views of the Caribbean.
conceptos.alt: Flor de Canela offers a mexican menu in Cancun Riviera Maya

conceptos.descripcion: Our elegant gourmet restaurant offers a selection of world cuisine: Mexican, International and Italian favorites, fresh seafood, tender prime steaks and other grilled dishes. Gifted chefs passionately select only the finest ingredients and cook them to perfection, so that every meal is a delicious experience.
conceptos.alt: Delight in El Faro Grill with a gourmet menu

conceptos.descripcion: Where paradise begins, the beach bar is a haven of serenity with incredible views and tropical ambiance. Enjoy a cold drink or your favorite snack on a comfortable sofa or on a lounge chair on the terrace under the Caribbean sun.
conceptos.alt: Heaven Beach Bar & Grill is a must to visit in our beachfront resort

conceptos.descripcion: Room service is a splendid luxury worth enjoying. Your personal waiter sets the table, serving each delicious dish and making sure that everything is perfect  as you dine in the comfort of your suite. Enjoy the outdoors on the oceanfront terrace or the cooler air in your suite.
conceptos.alt: Room service is a splendid luxury worth enjoying

restaurants.premium description: Try our selection of premium wines and spirits as well as the non-alcoholic drinks included in our All In Grand Experience plan.
restaurants.descripcion noches: Don’t miss the daily theme nights for a variety of tempting flavors from all over the world.

room service.title: Your room like a restaurant
room service.descripcion: Enjoy our 24-hour room service. Your personal waiter  will take care of every detail with an eye for perfection. Sit down to a gourmet meal in the comfort of your air-conditioned suite or dine by candlelight outdoors on the ocean-view terrace or balcony.
alts: Enjoy our best dishes in the comfort of your room
Enjoy your food on your terrace or balcony
Enjoy luxury service with our room service

experiencias.title: Pool Bar
experiencias.descripcion: The pool is the favorite gathering place for guests as they enjoy the selection of signature cocktails and the incredible panoramic views of our white sand beach and the Caribbean. Cool off at the swim-up bar as you sip your favorite drink.
experiencias.alt: Pool Bar: The pool is the favorite place for a cool drink in Cancun Riviera Maya

experiencias.title: Chef in Suite
experiencias.descripcion: Enjoy intimate moments in your room with your family while you watch our Chef preparing delicious dishes just for you. What would you like to eat? The chef’s inspiration and the finest ingredients are all you need for an exceptional dining experience.
experiencias.alt: Chef in Suite: Enjoy a private experience dining with a Chef in your Suite

experiencias.title: Afternoon Tea
experiencias.descripcion: Enjoy classic English afternoon tea on the terrace with a delectable spread of freshly made sandwiches, scones and cakes and the fragrance of the finest teas.
experiencias.alt: Afternoon Tea: Experience a classic english afternoon tea in a luxury resort

experiencias.title: Lobby Bar & Café
experiencias.descripcion: Enjoy the relaxed and chic atmosphere of the Lobby Bar and Café with your friends and family. It’s our pleasure to serve you gourmet coffee, cocktails, beers, spirits, wines, premium tequila and mezcal and even more.
experiencias.alt: Lobby Bar & Café: Satisfy your palate with a gourmet espresso and innovative cocktails

experiencias.title: The Gourmet Food Market
experiencias.descripcion: Find everything you need within the hotel shop, top quality products including grocery, dairy, fruits and vegetables, drinks, beer, wine, liquor, ice cream, sandwiches, pastries, cigars, biscuits, sauces, chocolates, organic and natural products and souvenirs and clothing.
experiencias.alt: The Gourmet Food Market: Anything you need in a beachfront resort you can find it in our Hotel Shop

restaurants.tour_360_description: Take a virtual tour of our restaurants, see the view and the ambiance. You’ll soon be here enjoying the selection of show stopper gourmet dishes they serve.
